short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically check all JioFi status like Battery Level, Signal Strength, Connected users etc of any JioFi router(hotspot).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension for JioFi to automatically check all JioFi status like Battery Level, Signal Strength, Connected users etc of any JioFi router(hotspot) when connected.
This JioFi extension supports all JioFi devices. It is based on "JioFi Local".

Features:
   * Get all JioFi status like Battery Level, Signals, Connected users etc.
   * Get current Download and current Upload speed statistics. 
   * Get notified when battery level is less than 20%.

(Note: The Extension is now updated for manifest version 3.)
